attributes.docAbstract: The Administration for Children and Families (ACF), Children’s Bureau (CB) is seeking public comment, in particular from State and Tribal title IV–B agencies and Indian Tribes, Tribal organizations and consortia (Tribes), and State and Tribal courts on providing technical assistance related to the Indian Child Welfare Act of 1978 (ICWA), removing undue burden related to meeting the requirements of title IV– B of the Social Security Act (the Act), changes to the Court Improvement Program, and amendments aimed at increasing the number of studies of programs and services eligible for review by the Title IV–E Prevention Services Clearinghouse.
attributes.title: Providing Technical Assistance Related to the Indian Child Welfare Act
